text: A biovar is a variant prokaryotic strain that differs physiologically or biochemically from other strains in a particular species. Morphovars (or morphotypes) are those strains that differ morphologically. Serovars (or serotypes) are those strains that have antigenic properties that differ from other strains. ==See also== *Chemovar ==References== Category:Microbiology terms Category:Taxonomy (biology)
title: Biovar
